snippet.title: Lenovo ThinkPad Yoga
snippet.description: Lenovo solves half the Yoga equation with a clever hidden keyboard on the ThinkPad Yoga. If we could combine this with the higher-res screen and better looks of the consumer version, we'd have the ultimate hybrid.

snippet.title: Lenovo YOGA Tablet 10 HD+
snippet.description: The new Yoga Tablet 10 HD+ is a step up from previous entries in the line, at least in terms of specs.

snippet.title: Lenovo Yoga Tablet 8
snippet.description: Though it feels well-built and has a handy kickstand, the Lenovo Yoga Tablet’s poor performance makes it hard to justify even at its low cost.

snippet.title: Lenovo Yoga Tablet 10
snippet.description: Though it feels well-built and has a handy kickstand, the Lenovo Yoga Tablet’s poor performance makes it hard to justify even the low cost.

snippet.title: Lenovo Yoga 2 13-inch
snippet.description: New, less-expensive Yoga models drop the higher-res screens, but keep the 360-degree hinge.

snippet.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 2 Pro
snippet.description: A major update to our favorite Windows 8 hybrid, the IdeaPad Yoga 2 Pro is still a better laptop than tablet, but the new version adds a future-proof better-than-HD display at a great price.

snippet.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 11S
snippet.description: Like the larger 13-inch model, the 11-inch Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 11S is a useful hybrid that doesn't forget it's a laptop first, but it's stuck with what feels like old hardware for now.

snippet.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 11
snippet.description: The Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 11 is a great laptop alternative that's unfortunately too bulky to completely replace your tablet.

snippet.title: How to pick the perfect Yoga
snippet.description: Lenovo's shape-shifting PC line is getting complicated, but we'll show you how to pick the best model for you.

snippet.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 13
snippet.description: The Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 13 is a convertible touch-screen laptop/tablet that most importantly doesn't compromise the traditional laptop experience.
